name: Continuum
description:
> "The future isn't waiting ‚Äî it's fighting."
### üéô Theme
**Innovation, rebellion, and raw momentum.** Continuum is chaotic, experimental, and edgy. It's the proving ground for newer wrestlers and the home of the Intertemporal and Extreme divisions. Think of it as the *collision point of chaos and evolution*.
### üèü Environment Description
The show is set in a **high-tech warehouse-like venue** with glitching holograms, shifting neon lighting, and an unpredictable vibe. The stage seems to shift or pulse like it's phasing through realities.
The crowd is younger, rowdy, and emotionally reactive ‚Äî "cheer the rebel, boo the corporate."
### üéÆ Storytelling Vibe
‚Ä¢ Factions dominate the show
‚Ä¢ Run-ins, drama cards, and weapon use are common
‚Ä¢ Sci-fi-style angles like "time clones," "memory wipes," or "alternate universe wrestlers"
‚Ä¢ Underhanded tactics are expected, not surprising
### üß† Booking Flavor
‚Ä¢ Open the show with **chaotic energy** ‚Äî brawls, unresolved drama, or surprise matches
‚Ä¢ Heavy use of **stipulation matches** or **Extreme Rules**
‚Ä¢ Heat-driven storylines, including rogue managers and faction wars
‚Ä¢ Tag matches and Intertemporal Title matches featured here

content.mainEvent: Intertemporal or Extreme Title matches with chaotic elements

production.specialStaging: Glitching holograms and shifting neon lighting with reality-phasing effects
production.commentary: Edgy, experimental commentary focusing on chaos and evolution

name: Timeless
description:
> "Where legends reign and history is made again."
### üéô Theme
**Classic prestige and grand rivalries.** Timeless is your *flagship show*, focused on legacy, honor, and intergenerational conflict. This is where main-event feuds are born and wrestling tradition is sacred ‚Äî even when it's broken.
### üèü Environment Description
The arena has **golden spotlights**, **marble-like pillars**, and a **coliseum-inspired LED screen**. Commentators speak in a mix of reverence and hype, invoking historic feuds and past champions often.
Fans are older, louder, and more traditional ‚Äî think "ECW crowd meets Ric Flair fans."
### üéÆ Storytelling Vibe
‚Ä¢ Long-running feuds and rematches
‚Ä¢ Grand promos, in-ring debates, and "contract signings"
‚Ä¢ Veterans and icons often appear here first
‚Ä¢ Face vs Heel storytelling is emphasized
‚Ä¢ Title pictures are established and elevated
### üß† Booking Flavor
‚Ä¢ Start each show with a **"Legacy Spotlight"** (promo or segment recalling a past event)
‚Ä¢ Matches tend to have **clean finishes** or **classic interference** (e.g., someone costs the match, but doesn't brawl)
‚Ä¢ Great place for **World Title defenses** or contenders being decided

content.mainEvent: World Title defenses or main-event feuds with legacy implications

production.venue: Traditional arena (8,000-12,000 capacity) with classic wrestling atmosphere
production.specialStaging: Golden spotlights, marble-like pillars, and coliseum-inspired LED screens
production.commentary: Reverent and hype-focused commentary invoking historic feuds and past champions
